param.string: Integrate Gemini CLI with UniFi Network Controller Service

This ticket outlines the steps to integrate the Gemini CLI with the UniFi Network Controller service, enabling automated management and information retrieval from UniFi devices via Gemini CLI commands. This will enhance network visibility and control through the Gemini platform.
* Investigate UniFi Network Controller API documentation for available endpoints. * Develop Ansible playbooks or scripts to interact with the UniFi API. * Create Gemini CLI commands/functions to leverage these integrations. * Document the new integration within the system's knowledge base.

value.string: unifi, gemini, Integration, API, Automation, SCM, Service, Application
